alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 24 at 2:50AM CDT until October 24 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts around 45 mph expected. Strongest late morning into early afternoon. * WHERE...In Minnesota, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, Southern Lake, Southern Cook and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. In Wisconsin, Douglas County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation, the Fond du Lac Band and the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake and, Lake Vermilion areas. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 4 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
